object.name: SEASAT 1 Satellite details 1978-064A NORAD 10967
object.information: The Ocean Dynamics Satellite (Seasat 1) was designed to provide measurements of sea-surface winds, sea-surface temperatures, wave heights, internal waves, atmospheric liquid water content, sea ice features, ocean features, ocean topography, and the marine geoid.

link.title: This article uses material from AFSPC
